column4: I want to run a ubuntu LAMP server from an SD card in a USB adapter. The machine is an Atom job, without (permanent) CD/CVC drive. What is the best way to get this live Ubuntu server on the (bootable) SD card?
install lots of ram so you can load the OS into a ramdisk.
yes, but then how to get it in RAM. Also, my system is meant to be low power. Now it's at 20W or so.
